pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena saṃgho sannipatito hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.3: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū cīvarakammaṃ karontā ekassa chandaṃ adaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.4: Atha kho saṃgho “yassatthāya sannipatito taṃ kammaṃ karissāmī”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.6: “evamevime ekamekassa kammaṃ karonti, kassa tumhe kammaṃ karissathā”ti chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.8: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu saṃghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.9: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, saṃghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.12: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, saṃghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:1.15: “Yo pana bhikkhu saṃghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.1.6: vatthu vā ārocitaṃ hoti avinicchitaṃ, ñatti vā ṭhapitā hoti, kammavācā vā vippakatā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.1.8: “kathaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ kuppaṃ assa vaggaṃ assa na kareyyā”ti gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.2.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.2.2: Dhammakamme vematiko chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.2.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamati, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.3.2: “saṃghassa bhaṇḍanaṃ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī”ti gacchati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.3.4: “adhammena vā vaggena vā na kammārahassa vā kammaṃ karissatī”ti gacchati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc80:2.3.7: uccārena vā passāvena vā pīḷito gacchati,
